blackjackplayground

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackjackplayground.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    Class represents a deck of basic playing cards that can be shuffled, and from witch cards can be dealt from

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      Creates a new Deck object that stores the 52 different playing cards in order

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card drawCard()
      Returns the first Card of the deck.
      void shuffle()
      Uses the card storage to shuffle a new 52 card deck of playing cards.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        Creates a new Deck object that stores the 52 different playing cards in order

    • Method Detail

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Uses the card storage to shuffle a new 52 card deck of playing cards.

      • drawCard

        public Card drawCard()
        Returns the first Card of the deck. If the deck is empty (all the cards have been drawn or the Deck object was just created), uses shuffle() to refill it.
        Returns:
        first Card of the deck
